website_summaries.verdict: An ideal, all-around ILIFE robotic vacuum cleaner designed for general use on a variety of floor types.
pros: Can handle different floor types like hardwood and low-pile carpeted floors automatically
Comes with a boundary definer to keep the vacuum contained to a single room
cons: Due to poor filter placement, the vacuum can clog up before debris hits the dust bin

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend a robotic vacuum that fails after just six months ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum failed after six months. After contacting customer care and receiving initial responses, I haven't from them again. The product is supposed to have a 12 month warranty - however I am having a very hard time gaining assistance in resolving the issue or non-working merchandise. IT did work very well for 6 months. At the 6th month mark it stopped clean autonomously and can only be operated manually using the remote. I cannot recommend a robotic vacuum that fails after just six months of use; or a company that doesn't respond to customer inquiries, echange or refund requests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EyeBeetle
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh. Mr. Beetles.. My home is all Porcelain tile and this little buggar takes one chore out of my day. Goes under beds and tables. Picks up dust, lint, hair etc. that I probably wouldnt have found. Runs for about an hour and a half on a full charge. Remote is cool. Starting to get a little personal though. Likes to be around the action. For some reason its demand for human attention is starting to increase. I clean him out daily and go through everything with an air nozzle.That seems to be keeping his morale up. Couldnt live with out him. Just keep the bathroom door closed when your in there. Sometimes a bit nosey..
customer_reviews.author: fonepwr

customer_reviews.title: Not for long haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work... I have a Husky and an Akita, and this robot does not do well with their hair. It will start to pick it up and then the entry way to the bin gets clogged with the hair at which point it just starts dragging the hair around on the floor. I have eve tried removing parts of the filter but the hair still gets clogged at the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first robotic vacuum and we absolutely LOVE IT!! We named him Herbie. I did extensive research before buying this vacuum and bought because it rated high and was very affordable compared to the Roomba. I'm amazed at how long it will go before needing to be recharged, approx 2 hours and how much dirt and dust it picks up everyday. I use it on hardwood floors so I can't say how well it works on carpet. You do need to move rugs, cords or curtains on the ground or use the virtual wall. I can't speak to the longevity of the vacuum since I've only had it about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have tile floors, and regularly sweep and mop. Despite regular cleaning, this little device manages to find plenty of dust and dirt. Largely I believe because it eventually vacuums every nook, corner, and baseboard, and inconvenient to access place in the house. It also seems to be less expensive than similar devices. So it's an excellent value, IMO. Caveats: I've only owned this contraption for a couple of weeks. So I can't speak to long term reliability. And this is my first robotic vacuum, so I'm not comparing to competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Nudnick

customer_reviews.title: Best $200 ever spent - and I get cleaner floors.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats and hardwood floors - I used to vacuum very day and still have cat hair everywhere and if I skipped the floors where so dirty. This little vacuum allows me to set it and forget it with the timer function. It's suction is good and picks up a ton of hair. As others mentioned, will get hung up on cords and rugs. The model with the rubber brush is great because no hair gets stuck. I like you can take it all apart and clean out any stuck hair or other things. Highly recommend. And no I didn't get anything for free for this review. I think it performs well and worthy of a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly fish1

customer_reviews.title: Get one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5 year Roomba user and purchased a ILIFE A4 robot 6 months ago. Liked it so much I got another. Both are fantastic. Much quieter than the Roomba and much easier to clean. As it runs automatically every day it easily handles the floor dirt from two small dogs. I still love the Roomba, but at 1/3 the price both ILIFE robots are fantastic. As I have 3 levels to my house I have all three levels with a robot vacuum. The only downside is the A6 does not handle fringes on throw rugs as well as the A4 due to the rubber (instead of brush) sweeper. Otherwise, both are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Atkins

customer_reviews.title: so far i love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it, we run it twice a day. we have 2 large dogs that shed a lot and living in Vegas there is a lots of dust. sometimes it has a hard time going back to the base. everytime we run it the "basket" is full. i once took it apart a little to be able to clean the inside properly, especially around the wheels. a couple times i pop the small wheel to clean around the axle. we always use it on max, we have tile floor and some rugs, it has not problems anywhere. so far so good !!
customer_reviews.author: Loic

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love about this small guy?
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about this small guy for the money you pay for it? It's somewhat random, it forgets fast and learns slow, however: - Covers my 900sqf apartment on a single charge. - Quiet enough that I can run it even at 10 pm if I needed. - It does vacuum my shag rug and medium piled carpet. - It doesn't bounce into things that hard to leave scratches and damage furniture. - It's easy to clean afterwards. - The included virtual wall is very handy if I want to speed up cleaning by limiting the robot to certain sections of my home.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Died after two Weeks but Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We were pleased with he A6 for the first week, but on the second week it has started to die after about 40 minutes. We have found it dead in the middle of the kitchen about 10 feet from the docking station about 6-8 times this week. I would like a replacement but they only offer a return option and reorer at a higher price than we paid on Prime Day. Totally bummed. UPDATE: The Vendor is quickly sending a replacement for the dafective robot. Great job Sherry
customer_reviews.author: Joe Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Decent Roomba substitute
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my Roomba 880. It cleans just as well on hard floors while being much quieter and less crashing into things. Best of all, its thinner so it goes under my couch! I was totally fed up with the Roomba 880 getting stuck under couch and kitchen cupboards! Not much good for dog hair on rugs however. I've had to break out my regular vac to go over the rugs weekly. Biggest complaint is the "virtual wall" needing to be turned on and off manually, wish it just activated like the IRobot brand (Roomba). Considering prices difference, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JaiJaiW

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome, our 1st robot
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, our 1st robot. I researched and picked the i6 as it's the shortest on the market, fits under all our furniture. No more dust bunnies or hair. Helped us prep for large party this weekend l. Cleaned kitchen and living room flawlessly. I get up at 4am to swim each day, tell i6 to go to work. Runs 2 hours minimum and full of dust, fur and dirt each day. (Live on ranch with 6 dogs). Almost bought the roomba at Costco, main reason was this is the shortest on the market
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend going with a name brand robot vac if only ...
customer_reviews.text: This robot appears to be of the same quality as more expensive name brands. It's really not. It regularly gets stuck in places it shouldn't, and it recently quit working after about nine months of operation. Customer support is nearly non-existent. I called their support number during their advertised business hours, only to get a busy signal all day. I then sent an email and haven't heard back from them. I'd recommend going with a name brand robot vac if only for the customer support piece. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great on Hard Floors, Not on Carpot
customer_reviews.text: This works great on hard floors but is only marginal on carpets. If I had it to do over again, I would buy a robotic vacuum with a true brush instead of a foam roller. The tradeoff is that brush rollers are more tedious to clean than foam rollers, but they work much better on carpet. If you only have hard floors, I highly recommend this nicely priced robovac, but if you have significant carpet, get one with a brush roller.
customer_reviews.author: CEP

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This unit runs very quietly and picks up even the finest dust and debris. It has a long battery life (>2 hours) and does a nice job of completely vacuuming tile floors in my 3400 ft2 house on a daily basis. It's programmed to run daily and it does its job with dependability.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So this is the second ILife vacuum I’ve purchased in the last year. The first one broke down after 11 months, contacted the company and haven’t heard back from them. So we purchase a second one that was on a lighting deal since the first one couldn’t be fixed. After about two weeks the vacuum stops working. Never again. I will be returning this one before the warranty runs out. $$$ down the drain with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: iLife Changing
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this robo vac so much I bought 2 of them for my home. I have had the Bob robot vac and it was too loud. I have 6 pets and I have these guys on daily. It greatly helps with picking up all kinds of dander and debris. The only issue I have is that it does get snagged and stuck if the floor is not clear of obstructions. I have worked out a system where it no longer gets stuck and it works fine. I have tile floor and it is quiet. It does not map the house it is very random were it cleans but it still picks up a lot. Worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dalya84

customer_reviews.title: Breaks stuff
customer_reviews.text: Regretted buying this item. Though the unit has reasonably strong suction, it is a rather aggressive and not well trained AI. In our home the unit knocked over furniture and left us with a morning surprise of lots of broken glass. The unit waits till it has a pressure sensor fully depressed, so it needs to have sufficient positive force to stop going in a particular direction (exception is a floors edge, so unit won't fall from a second floor ledge. In net I would have done a lot less work regularly vacuuming the old fashioned way as opposed to cleaning up after the big mess the unit left me.
customer_reviews.author: lazy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hard working little machine
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year and a half and she's still going strong. Long battery life. I live in a dust bowl, she pulls up dust from the carpet when it looks perfectly clean. Love this cleaning gal!! She just goes and goes and goes, and pulls up nearly everything. The only thing she has trouble with is short wiry dog hair from my low kitchen throw rug, but I'm happy to drag out the big guy on occasion to take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Humboldt Honey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and effective hardwood floor vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. I have not used the scheduler that comes with the cleaner but start it up manually about every third day. Despite the apparently random path it follows around the house it does an excellent job of cleaning the laminate and hardwood floors in the house, has no problem crossing raised (3/8") thresholds and has eliminated all of the dust bunnies under the furniture and beds. The run time on a full charge is around 2 1/2 hours. I found that cleaning the dust collector, rotating brush, filters and wheels after each provides the best results.
customer_reviews.author: SWFL Mikki

customer_reviews.title: No longer charges...
customer_reviews.text: As a 3-time Roomba owner, I thought I would save some money and go with ILife. Big mistake. After a 4 months of ownership and a handful of uses, it no longer charges. When it was working, I wasn't very happy with its intelligence and inability to maneuver out of tight spots. As a result, my room would remain unvaccummed and I would find this ILife wedged somewhere in the room. Will be contacting Amazon for some sort of help on this issue...
customer_reviews.author: APMK

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum was great for first 2 months. It was used 3-4 times a week and cleaned each week as instructed. We have hard wood floors and 2 pets with a lot of hair. The vacuum cleaned very well and had no problems getting stuck or lost. We were happy with it until it stopped working. Going to have to see how good iLife customer service is?
customer_reviews.author: MDarter13

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take care of our kitchen/dinning /living room which has hardwood floors.I was sick of the constant sweeping.Having a 7yo and wife with long hair and a black cat it was doing my head in.Now I just push the clean button and let the Vacuum do the work.I use the barrier to stop it going into the carpeted are of the house so it just does the wood floors and carpet mats which it has no trouble getting on and off of.easy to clean and easily finds its way back to the docking when finished.Just keep your floor clear of anything it may tangle in like cords of cloths and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable after 2 two months of daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I have had "Little Cruiser" running daily for about 2 months now. It has been very reliable and It does a great job in all of the tight corners and edges. It has good power and has had no issues except for on high carpet throw rugs. It occasionally runs out of power before returning to it's charging base, and needs electrical cords to be kept out of it's path, but other than that It is really a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted- less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This little guy really helped keep down the dirt and hair in my dog-friendly home. I could really notice a difference. However, I am sad to report that even with regular cleanings he did not live as long as I hoped. It was great while it lasted for 10 months before a gear in one of the wheels stripped. All I need is a wheel to replace it but have not found anywhere to buy replacement parts. I want another one but may look for a brand that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only work 9 months before having issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Robot vacuum 9 months ago. It had done well for the first seven eight months but then it started to haveso when I issues. First I noticed it would sweep the hair and dirt but it wasn't actually sucking it into the holding Trey. then recently it started to automatically reverse Loop until it shut itself down like it was stuck. I cleaned it like the sensors do the same to fix it at first but then Within 20 minutes and started acting up again. I have contacted customer service to see how they will help me. I'll update my review according to hell they help.
customer_reviews.author: Xbsims

customer_reviews.title: Wife was skeptical....
customer_reviews.text: ...but over the course of the few months we've had she has openly stated what a good purchase it was. It picks up dog hair from our lab as well as other household dirt on both the hardwood as well as carpet. We have it run every night as scheduled with the only issue being that it picks up so much that I have to empty the waste bin, wish it were bigger is only complaint and thus only 4 stars. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schrag

customer_reviews.title: This is the best $300 I've spent in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $300 I've spent in a long time. I have a Pug puppy that's 9 months old and the only thing I can say bad about her is she sheds and of course I knew that before I bought her. The ILIFE is a miracle worker all by itself! I run it everyday and it keeps my hardwood floors nice and clean and "almost" hair free. My Pug loves it and follows it around and the ILIFE can't quite keep up with the shed level but it's close. I just love it... But it and you won't regret it....
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Page

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year and 5 months with regular maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 3 stars because it worked great just not for as long as expected. We loved this vacuum at first it worked great with our dog hair and toddler. It lasted 1 year and 5 months and is a complete piece of crap now. Won’t run for more than a few seconds with out giving errors gets stuck on a rug to hardwood transition spins in circles sometimes until we turn it off and back on again. I guess we should’ve spent more money and got a better one.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my ILIFE robot vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my ILIFE A6 Robotic Vacuum. I have 2 cats and sadly for me, I am somewhat of a clean freak. This vacuum allows me to keep up on daily maintenance of hair and dust. I love that it is so low profile and is able to vacuum underneath all but one piece of furniture. Unfortunately, one of my cats has a sensitive stomach and gets sick at least once a week so I am unable to set the auto/timer feature, but for anyone without that issue, I am certain you would use it and love it. I can't say enough positive things about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Good product as all iLife we have but I would still prefer the A4s.
customer_reviews.text: We are big fans of iLife, this is the fourth I bought it for different people and houses, very good customer support. Have all of them working like hell.I still would stay with A4s although is a bit higher in dimension, dust compartment is a bit smaller on the A6 and I think battery life/productivity is not as good as with the A4s.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Dragging around doggie dookie! Haha
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift but wasn’t able to keep it as my mother was mortified by her friend who’s dog had done his business on the floor and her vacuum went through it, and dragged it all through out the house. Not something I would’ve ever thought of but definitely something to consider if you have poorly trained pets! Nothing wrong with this product specifically though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scheduled Timer cleaning no longer works at all on unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Scheduled Timer cleaning no longer works at all on unit, after a month of use. Also, note that this unit cannot be manually controlled by you ever - why you would make this kind of thing with no user control option is silly. Also, support is email only, with overseas workers that are not that helpful since they have difficulty understanding non-typical questions.
customer_reviews.author: ravl13

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This is my second iLife. First one had light usage for 2-3 months and then started to move in a 3x3 box instead of moving all the way till an obstacle is encountered. I thought it was a bad lemon. I liked everything else about it (size, cleaning ability etc.) and decided to buy the next version. Two months later the same problem! Bad product! Beware.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget is so awesome I don’t know where to begin
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is so awesome I don’t know where to begin. It’s simple to use. It’s reliable and on schedule. It does a great job keeping our house clean and free of dust and pet hair. Every room! When it gets tired, it goes back to its docking station and recharges for its next tour. It must be maintained, but that is easy too. After more than 100 runs I had a problem and sent it back to ILIFE. 5 days later I received a brand-new robot. Their promise is good and service fast. I would recommend the ILIFE products to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schebler

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dog hair at bay!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this vacuum for about two weeks now and it has improved our quality of life exponentially! We were drowning in dog hair from our Dalmatian puppy and his little white wirey hairs were covering our house from top to bottom. While we still have to do a deep vacuum on the weekends, running the robot vacuum (or Johnny 5 as we have been affectionately calling it) helps keep things manageable throughout the week. Our floors are free of dog hair and all the other debris that comes with two kids and two dogs. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George K Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a Beast.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans better than i expected.Hardwood to Area rug with no problem.And i notice it's pretty gentle when it makes contact with the furniture,i thought it might bang into the table legs scratching them,that's not the case.The remote is working fine as well.Much more bang for my buck,I'm glad i went with this model.Good for about 2 Hours send it home it charges right up and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: gintsfan

customer_reviews.title: good suction but random pattern
customer_reviews.text: this one works great and we use it all the time, but it it runs in a totally random pattern. if it ran in a pattern it would repeat the same section less. we need to use the remote to send it to places it missed while it was busy vacuuming the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyDew

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING - What a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought these things could do what they claim but it really works. There is a little learning curve while you get the unit to do the best job for your particular floor plan but it's a fun process. Quality materials and well made. You'll need to be diligent about keeping it clean and free of hair and debris to maintain high efficiency, but it's worth it. I was doubtful but I am now a big fan. Can't wait until they outfit this unit with Alexa!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 dogs that shed a bunch and this thing picks up the hair better than my vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I gotta be honest...I was very skeptical on buying this, thinking it's not going to work...no way! Let me tell you IT DOES! I have 2 dogs that shed a bunch and this thing picks up the hair better than my vacuum cleaner. The best thing is that it just does it's thing and all I have to do is empty the lint tray. My dogs think they have a new friend to play with...pretty fun to watch. Great product!!! Already told 5 of my friends. Should have purchased this a long time ago. Totally Recommend it! T Brown
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding robot vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was curious and skeptical on how well the vacuum will perform but after owning for a week I am extremely impressed. This vacuum has collected so much dust and pet hair (1 cat), I am blown away. You do have to pay attention to leaving your phone charging cords or wires laying around as it will get tangled but besides that it has worked with no problems every mission and even returns back to its charging station to re-arm. I am also impressed on how quiet the unit is when it's on duty, a family member has a Roomba and that unit sounds like a jet engine.
customer_reviews.author: George Romero

customer_reviews.title: Super smart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago and we finally laid down wood floors and I put it to use it’s very awesome and cleans well. Very impressive we paid &212.00 and a few cents and it works really good it was rated a good choice in consumer reports magazine at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love this, use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about how well a small vacuum could clean. However, now it is shedding season for our animals and usually we have to vacuum everyday to keep up with all the fur around the house. This works very well to pick up the extra fur. Something I didn't think about when buying this product was that I would have to pick up around the house because otherwise it gets stuck on things like light weight rugs and cords. We haven't been able to figure out the automatic scheduling system, but we tend to just set it to go whenever we leave the house. Overall I think it works very well for not having room mapping.
customer_reviews.author: soccer7maniac7

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase in every way
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I love this vacuum.. One of the best features is how easy it is to clean, which I would imagine would add to its life. It cleans well and is quieter than another model I had in the past. Since getting it, we got a puppy who is shedding quite a bit. This vacuum has been amazing, as long as I clean it each time. It is a great vacuum, especially with the reasonable price. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DdSs

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome robotic vacuum at a very reasonable price compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome robotic vacuum at a very reasonable price compared to the competition and without a compromise on efficiency. I have already recommended this product to several family and friends and they too are equally pleased. This has literally freed up about 2 hours of vacuuming a week for me. It works so well, I'm contemplating also purchasing one for the upstairs of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Thibaud W

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price.
customer_reviews.text: Going from a Roomba to this I'd say it for the most part gets the job done. While the hopper is bigger, where the fan is located it doesn't allow the hopper to completely fill unlike the Roomba, so you have to constantly open the hopper and either push the pet hair back or just empty it. It says it's better for carpet, but I still have to vacuum behind it. I wish when it would automatically go off that it would start on the highest suction setting- I'm not sure what the preprogrammed lowest setting is suppose to suck up. Overall, it's okay- especially for its price compared to a Roomba, but if you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't "notify" you like our Neato did
customer_reviews.text: Just received it a few days ago - yes, as others have said, I cant understand why these companies do not hire someone to write the instruction manual that actually knows English syntaxes, verbage, etc! Seems to work well; will update in a few weeks - we do wish it had a larger dust bin, as when it gets full, it doesn't "notify" you like our Neato did, but just leaves clumps of dog hairs around....
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Move along, nothing to see here
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The pattern program is terrible and does not return to base on low battery. Not sure what annoys me more, the fact it constantly gets stuck under things out that it will clean a small area for 2 hours. Battery is great, dual suction modes are great. The rest, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E Gobble

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and I haven't picked  up my regular vacuum in months
customer_reviews.text: Where was this thing all my life. I've done a ton of research, reviews and finally settled on this product and absolutely love it. The amount of nasty fine dust this thing picks up every day is kind of scary. I used to vacuum (using a dyson) every few weeks and certainly would pick-up a ton of dust; knowing that I lived with that dust daily would creep me out. Now I know the little guy keeps our apartment clean daily. Just remember to clean it regularly. Also, i dropped it a few times - no damage, works as well as new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: not worth the expensive cost
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets DO NOT spend the money on this... This vacuum is designed to be a dust mop on wood floors. The dirt collection container cannot handle any bit of pet hair. I have 2 short haired dogs and the vacuum can only actually work for about 15 minutes (which equals about a 4x4 ft area) before the vacuum gets clogged and stops sucking up. I try to use it every day and have to use my Dyson hand held across the floor first before I turn it on to get any use out of it. Very disappointed for the cost. I wish. I could return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Fields

customer_reviews.title: I am converted to robotic vacuuming now!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months now and really love the efficiency it offers. Great cleaning, not too loud and very easy to use. The only catch for me was lots of oriental rugs which I had to tape up along the edges. If you had hardwood floors or carpeting it would not be an issue. It also does a great job on dog hair. Great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Like the rubber impeller for picking up dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Very long battery life. Like the rubber impeller for picking up dog hair. Gets under most furniture though it occasionally gets stuck-wish the distress beeper would be louder and continue for longer time. The invisible fence works well. We have all tile floors with only a few rugs and it cleans well. Very please with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum part works great. I've got a couple friends with brand-name Roomba's ...
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum part works great. I've got a couple friends with brand-name Roomba's and this does every bit as good at a fraction of the cost. My only complaint is that even after trying to turn off the timer function with the remote it still automatically starts at night when we don't need it to. I'm not sure how to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: psngt

customer_reviews.title: Ignored the steps, but survived the fall!
customer_reviews.text: This does better than not doing anything. Sometimes I still vacuum to clean up what the robot can't. I've had it a couple times where the robot completely ignores that it's on the edge of some stairs and falls down them. It still works though! I've also had it ignore the virtual wall once or twice. :/
customer_reviews.author: Abiz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Did a great deal of research and reviewing. Finally made the purchase and I love it! Great on hardwood floors and does a great job keeping dust and animal dander off the floor! Programable or manual settings. Empty the dust bin, clean the brushes and good to go. I really love it, should not have waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I have a Great Pyrenees/Labrador mix
customer_reviews.text: This guy is the bomb. I have a Great Pyrenees/Labrador mix, known as a pyrador! She sheds immensely and this guy does the job! It does fill rather quickly with bigger, heavily shedding dogs, but nothing you shouldn't expect with a small self vacuuming robot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura and Jerry

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it. Looked intimidating, but was actually quite easy to set up and use. It tracks well over my area rugs and cleans very well Cons: it will occasionally hold up on the finge of an area rug. It can usually free itself, but it does occasionally have to be freed.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: As good as Roomba at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I have another from the same company that still working after 2 years so I thought I would buy him a friend. This one is cool because it has a rubber brush that doesn't get clogged up with hair and it comes with an invisible wall to keep it out of areas you choose in your home. No need to buy a Roomba
customer_reviews.author: Mughandles

customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome. One of the best things I've ever bought. It works just as good as the Roomba and is a fraction of the cost. Everyone wants to steal in. It picks up so much debris. Really helps to keep the house clean between cleaning. Easy to use and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: it picked up better with the brush attachment than the rubber roller
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about 3 weeks and it quit working. When it was working, it picked up better with the brush attachment than the rubber roller, which hardly picked up anything. The rubber strip on the bottom started ripping off within a week. It seemed to focus on certain areas, spending a lot of time in one area. I got a refund without problem from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Past model was a winner
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but nothing like the previous model. The collection bin is smaller. The brush, now that it’s rubber doesn’t pick up half what it used to; for granted it’s easier to clean and keep free of debris. I would trade this new model for another version of the old model anytime. Unfortunately I waited to open it until we moved because I thought for sure it would be better than the old model and now I’m past my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Festr06

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but definitely has some issues. ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but definitely has some issues. It can't find it's way back to HOME often and will randomly start beeping and stop working in specific places in our home (and no, it is not wrapped or stuck on something). It works decent enough for a knock-off brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the secound robot vacuum I have had and this one does not do as good as job as the first one
customer_reviews.text: The pattern that it runs tends to repeat itself, so it does the same area multilple times. The dust collecter does not get filled to the back, it all packs in at the front. It gets stuck on everything, it got stuck on a kayak paddle some how. This is the secound robot vacuum I have had and this one does not do as good as job as the first one. I woulld keep looking for a differant brand if I where you.
customer_reviews.author: frank zelenka

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love and never going back to the iRobot! This thing picks up so much more.... And without the brush getting chock full of hair! I love that I can set it up to go on at the same time, everyday. My house is so much cleaner! Even my mother in law mentioned it.... And the proof was in the dust bin of my upright.... After using our new iLife V6 for a week, the bin on the upright vacuum is only half as full! This is one very satisfied momma!
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN  TIETZE

customer_reviews.title: Vacuuming made better!
customer_reviews.text: Our first robot vaccum and I can say it's been a good experience. The A6 does as advertised for the most part. No problem on hardwood floors or vinyl but it does not like our area rugs I think due to the padding we use. Small enough to go under beds and couches so these areas are cleaner than they have ever been. Requires some room preparation making sure obstacles are removed before running but then it's on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hennen

customer_reviews.title: it works pretty great, it picks up a ton of pet ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this vacuum for 5 months now, it works pretty great, it picks up a ton of pet hair, and dust, even after vacuuming/sweeping. Maintenance is super easy, I clean the filter every week or two depending on how often I run the vacuum. It’s definitely great buy especially if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Brin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Cons: trash tray easily get full takes a long time to clean 1000 sq ft media only good for hard floor carpet could not thoroughly clean Pros: Good for my dog to chase around as toy
customer_reviews.author: Czeal001

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Roomba but the A4S model is better than the A6 model. Worth the Money.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the A4S model. The vacuum was great but one of the spinners stopped working and I had to send it back. I upgraded to the A6. The suction is not as good, the waste does not collect in the waste basket. The vacuum drops dirt when climbing up and down low pile carpets and gets stuck alot more. My dad and I both have these vacuums and he experiences the same issues. ILIFE advised me they are still working on glitches with this model. Totally recommend the A4S. Cheaper and better made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully a better unit comes along and will impress me
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a while before writing this review. I feel that maybe a robotic vacuum isn’t for me. I have heard so many people rant and rave about these but I’m not nearly as impressed. Hopefully a better unit comes along and will impress me.
customer_reviews.author: AlexE

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Irobot Roombas, very price and after2 years, it’s getting very loud while it’s working. This new robot is extremely quiet, and doing a fantastic job cleaning. Its belly gets full after 3 days. My main concern is dust on the hard wood floors. And with its price, this machine really is a unbelievable great deal. Their customer service is another wonderful experience. Accommodating and replies in timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN, CUI

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. First robotic vacuum I have owned. Now...would never be without one now. I run it every day. Floors always look good. The vacuum moves from carpet to tile to laminate without a problem. Only concern is buying replacement brushes etc. Some reviews suggest the exisiting replacement parts are not a good as what comes with the vacuum. I will need the filter replaced soon.
customer_reviews.author: hackcd

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe life-changing is over dramatic, but really, I cannot overemphasize how WONDERFUL this product is. Every day I come home to a clean floor. No pet-fur, no grit, dust bunnies or overlooked breakfast cereal flakes on the floor. We named her Rosie and I LOVE HER <3 <3 <3
customer_reviews.author: Practical Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this to all busy working parents. Three kids and two dogs and this thing works like magic! We set it to run at 1 am while we are all asleep, and it usually gets run once during the day. It’s very gentle around furniture, great cleaning around walls and thresholds, it picks up crumbs and dog hair with great suction. I wish i would have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't like to vacuum Black
customer_reviews.text: Device objects to cleaning Black/Dark Brown areas of room rug. Does well on vinyl floor. (Haven't tried Black or Dark Brown. Perhaps an override function for cleaning dark areas of floor?
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: ... is my first robotic vacuum and I am very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robotic vacuum and I am very pleased so far. I had a question and Customer Service responded quickly. Of course, no vacuum of this type will be able to clean as well as a live person, BUT with three cats, it is immeasurably helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Although it is inexpensive it does a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Although it is inexpensive it does a great job. It doesn't have the fancy features of more expensive models, but it keeps our floor clean. The customer service is also superb. My wife calls it the best gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum for a couple years now. Have to unwrap hair from it every other time I use it but besides that it is pretty easy to use. It has served me well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing! Busy mom with 4 kids and 2 big dogs. It goes everywhere! Just empty him 1 time which is super easy to do and he keeps going. House is around 2000 square ft and I think he's covered all of it on one charge! If he gets stuck on something he beeps so you can find him. Runs quietly and my dogs don't bark at it.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected. My whole house is ceramic wood tile and this thing runs for about 2 hours and 45 minutes. I put the virtual gate in the hallway and let it run daily in the main living area during the week and then turn the gate around and run it in the back once on the weekend so that I can keep an eye on it with all the obstacles in the bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: I got my first one replaced thinking I just got a bad one, but my second one was just as ...
customer_reviews.text: This product breaks so fast! Doesn’t work well for longer than about a week or two. I got my first one replaced thinking I just got a bad one, but my second one was just as bad. Would NoT recommend buying. Also, their customer service was horrible and amazon ended up helping me since they wouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I have a cat and it picks up hair with no issues on hardwood and tile floors. Has no trouble getting over thresholds and has no trouble going from wood floor to rugs. Only issue I have had is one rug with long fringe on the ends. It sometimes get tangled in the front brushes.
customer_reviews.author: John Stover

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great... However its 6 months later and my battery is dead.. Gee, I think I read that from one of the reviewers. Hope I don't have to send the whole unit back to the manufacturer. I should have gotten the warranty... Don't think I did.
customer_reviews.author: Marge N

customer_reviews.title: A Best Buy I’d recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Met or exceeded my expectations. For the money I was impressed with this robotic floor vacuum. Why pay 500$ or more. It’s not a romba but it’s well made and arrived promptly and well packaged. Will update review in few weeks regarding performance and quirks.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot Researchers

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a year a few times a week and haven’t had any problems with it except the timer randomly resets. Works great to clean up pet hair. Navigates fine and rarely gets stuck. Has a extra power mode that is useful. Could use a better filter.
customer_reviews.author: Damazon

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum & customer service
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum performs better than expected! It cleans in all the hard to reach areas and picks up more cat hair than I even knew existed! Highly recommend it to anybody looking for a robot. Also to add, customer service was excellent. Received my vacuum with the remote LCD not working properly. Promptly they shipped me a new one. Extremely satisfied overall!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Haskin

customer_reviews.title: like cooking or do the wash
customer_reviews.text: I can do other things while iLife cleans, like cooking or do the wash, feed the dogs, answer a phone call, reply an e-mail. Sometimes it needs some guidance but does a very good job by itself. And my back thanks iLife every day. Make sure you keep it clean. If you clean once a week and you have dogs it can do 2-3 rooms at a time, then needs to be cleaned. If you use it every day it can clean the whole house and then can be cleaned at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Scocchera

customer_reviews.title: Liking it more than the Roomba it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Had a Roomba for years but needed a new one and did not want to spend the extra money for the Roomba again. LOVING the iLife. I like that it is easy to schedule, it has a lower profile than my Roomba, it is very quiet and seems to run for hours. One thing I do miss is the handle on the Roomba that made it easy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this vacuum. We have 6 dogs in the house and she does a great job keeping the hair in check. We run her everyday and I clean her after every use. I will never be without one of these. Btw. Her name is Rosie. Lol
customer_reviews.author: nikki norman

customer_reviews.title: Good product but can get better for a few more dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Good for dog hair. If you have dirt on the floor it will only pick up about 75%. I use the Max function for best results. Good battery life. About 2 hours. It cleans about 1800 sq. ft. Off a single charge. Helps with the day to day clean up but don't think you can get away from sweeping or traditional vacuum if you want a spotless floor. I could have spent a few more dollars and got a iRobot Rumba .Duel spindle is better at picking up heavy dirt and debris.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it use it.
customer_reviews.text: was expecting it to be a contender for my gadget bin. was i wrong. love it. use it daily. if it only did not try to consume socks laying around. you wont believe the amount of dust/etc it collects in an already cleaned/mopped house...
customer_reviews.author: Remo

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product at first, but then had some issues with it in regards to the unit being too dusty after about a month of use. Customer service reached out and I have to say, did an amazing job of addressing the issue. Though the unit had some issues, customer service deserves 5 stars! If you get this and you are not happy about something - work with the company to sort it out, they care about making things right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK Vacuum but good luck finding replacement parts that fit!
customer_reviews.text: Really want to like this product but the support is abysmal. Can't find any replacement parts on Ilife web page. Support 800 number just goes to a busy signal. I ordered some of the 3rd party replacement parts but they don't seem to fit properly. Very disappointed in support for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: this will work great.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent for the most part, but it doesn't do well with long hair. The hair just gets wrapped around everything and you have to keep taking it off. If nobody in your house has long hair, this will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum a decent match for my golden retriever and Shepard mix dog. It picks up all debris on the tile service. We have medium length carpet and it definitely isn't as good as our full size vacuum but we have A LOT of dog hair. It has good coverage on the floors. It was very easy to program to go off at scheduled time. The invisible wall is awesome!!! I could use a few extras. One thing to note is to make sure you move all cords from the area. Overall very pleased with the vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Krystin Husmann

customer_reviews.title: Best robot to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best robot we found! Tried a few others and this robot is by far the best. Can fit under things and can handle the hair of our four Golden’s. We actually own two now for our large house. The first one we bought a year ago and it started to act up. Contacted the manufacturer and they just told us to ship it back and they would fix it. They did! At only the cost of shipping. Great robot and great company. Best Robot around!!
customer_reviews.author: Karli Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cleans the floors we have placed it on. Directions communicate, but clearly written by a non-English speaker. We have had it start at times when we weren't expecting it to, but could be user error.
customer_reviews.author: cougardawg

customer_reviews.title: It "sucks" but in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Overall it does a pretty good job I use it every day and the basket is always full and it helps keep down on the dust. It could be better but for the cost you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Allen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year and 3 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Right side brush not spinning after a year and 3 months of light use. I have removed the brush and wheel for cleaning and still not working. I emailed support and they said remove and clean the brush. I won’t buy another one, I expected it to last longer
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is PERFECT!!!👌🏽 I bought it for my 84 year old mom, she loves it as well. Great investment!! A must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: DISSATISFIED CUSTOMER!

customer_reviews.title: ILIFE A^ Robotic Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this, and only tried it on my kitchen tile floor. It just wasn't able to pick up grass clippings my husband drags in. Even some of the crumbs on the floor. Sorry to say, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Clalien Dahl

product_meta.title: ILIFE A6 Robotic Vacuum Cleaner
feature_bullets: The Gen 2 CyclonePower cleaning system enhanced to delivery thorough clean for your home.
Ultra slim A6 goes into most narrow low places under beds, night stands to clean hide dirt.
Extra long lasting Battery - Up to 100 Mins working time on a single charge
Use Electrowall as an invisible barrier to confine A6 cleaning in a particular area you want.
Automatically adapts to different types such as hardwood, low-pile carpets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars665 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 12 months warranty for the robot, 6 months warranty for the battery.
